spell_tooltip.description: Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt, up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Stamina increased by 10%.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 235,605 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Unending Resolve by 45 sec.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.
Agony damage increased by 15%.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by 15%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.

20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Afflicts one target with 2.2 million Shadow damage over 21 sec. 

If dispelled, deals 4.8 million damage to the dispeller and silences them for 4 sec.

Generates 1 Soul Shard if the target dies while afflicted.
Agony's damage starts at 4 stacks and may now ramp up to 18 stacks.

Embeds a demon seed in the enemy target that will explode after 9.2 sec, dealing 106,766 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards and applying Corruption to them.

The seed will detonate early if the target is hit by other detonations, or takes 47,121 damage from your spells.

Corruption is now permanent and deals 15% increased damage.

Duration reduced to 24 sec against players.
Malefic Rapture damage increased by 8%. Corruption damage increased by 20%.

Corruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Drain Soul to deal 75% increased damage. 

Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Drain Soul channels 50% faster when affected.

Refreshing Agony with 10 or less seconds remaining deals 154,993 Shadow damage to its target and enemies within 10 yards.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 15% and increases its damage by 40%.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Unleashes a vile explosion at the target location, dealing 510,668 Shadow damage over 10 sec to 8 enemies within 10 yds and applies Agony and Curse of Exhaustion to them.

A ghostly soul haunts the target, dealing 641,765 Shadow damage and increasing your damage dealt to the target by 10% for 18 sec.

If the target dies, Haunt's cooldown is reset.
Shadow Bolt applies Shadow Embrace, increasing your damage dealt to the target by 4% for 16 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

Summons a Darkglare from the Twisting Nether that extends the duration of your damage over time effects on all enemies by 8 sec.

The Darkglare will serve you for 20 sec, blasting its target for 166,053 Shadow damage, increased by 45% for every damage over time effect you have active on their current target.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul have a chance to trigger a Shadow Bolt Volley, dealing 181,144 Shadow damage to 5 enemies within 10 yards of your current target.
Increases the damage of Haunt by 35% and reduces its cast time by 25%. Haunt now applies Shadow Embrace.
Increases the damage of your Darkglare by 70%. When Darkglare extends damage over time effects it also sears affected targets for 769,680 Shadow damage.
Increases critical strike damage dealt by Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction by 15%.
Malefic Rapture damage is increased by 8% for each enemy it hits, up to 5 enemies.
Your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction deal damage 15% faster.

Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 4 additional targets nearby, causing your primary target to suffer 1.3 million Shadow damage and secondary targets to suffer 668,956 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

Damage dealt by Soul Rot heals you for 50% of damage done.

While Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction are active, your Shadow Bolt has a 30% chance and your Drain Soul has a 20% chance to make your next Malefic Rapture cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.
Unstable Affliction deals 20% increased damage.
Malefic Rapture deals 40% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.

Casting Soul Rot grants 3 applications of Malign Omen.

 Malign Omen
Your next Malefic Rapture deals 20% increased damage and extends the duration of your damage over time effects and Haunt by 2 sec.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal 8% increased damage, up to 24%, per damage over time effect you have active on the target.
Increases Malefic Rapture damage by 5% and reduces its cast time by 10%.
Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 4.0% for 8 sec.
Malefic Rapture deals an additional 108,512 Shadowflame damage to each target it affects.

A demonic entity now inhabits your soul, allowing you to detect if a Soul Shard has a Succulent Soul when it's generated. 

A Succulent Soul empowers your next Malefic Rapture, increasing its damage by 20%, and unleashing your demonic soul to deal an additional 194,090 Shadow damage.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by 20%. Nightfall increases the damage of Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul by an additional 50%.

Unleashing your demonic soul bestows a fiendish entity unto the soul of its targets, dealing 355,103 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Soul Anathema.
Your demonic soul deals 100% increased damage to targets affected by your Unstable Affliction.
Dark Pact now shields you for an additional 50% of the sacrificed health.

When you kill a target, its tortured soul is flung into a nearby enemy for 3 sec. This effect inflicts 49,814 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds every 0.8 sec.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Fel Domination cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Damage dealt by your demonic soul is increased by 10%.

Consuming Nightfall feeds the demonic entity within you, causing it to appear and deal 264,184 Shadow damage to your target.

Soul Anathema damage increased by 25% and is dealt 20% faster.

Consuming Nightfall activates Shared Fate or Feast of Souls.
Corruption deals damage 25% faster and Haunt grants Nightfall.
Your Soul Rot spell is empowered by the demonic entity within you, causing it to grant 3 Soul Shards that each contain a Succulent Soul.

Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul have a chance to trigger a Shadow Bolt Volley, dealing 198,423 Shadow damage to 5 enemies within 10 yards of your current target.

The stack count of Agony is increased by 4 when applied by Vile Taint.

Enemies damaged by Phantom Singularity take 10% increased damage from you for its duration.
Increases the damage of Haunt by 35% and reduces its cast time by 25%. Haunt now applies Shadow Embrace.
Increases the damage of your Darkglare by 70%. When Darkglare extends damage over time effects it also sears affected targets for 769,680 Shadow damage.
Malefic Rapture damage is increased by 8% for each enemy it hits, up to 5 enemies.
Your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction deal damage 15% faster.

Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 4 additional targets nearby, causing your primary target to suffer 1.3 million Shadow damage and secondary targets to suffer 668,956 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

Damage dealt by Soul Rot heals you for 50% of damage done.

While Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction are active, your Shadow Bolt has a 30% chance and your Drain Soul has a 20% chance to make your next Malefic Rapture cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.
Malefic Rapture deals 40% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.

Casting Soul Rot grants 3 applications of Malign Omen.

 Malign Omen
Your next Malefic Rapture deals 20% increased damage and extends the duration of your damage over time effects and Haunt by 2 sec.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal 8% increased damage, up to 24%, per damage over time effect you have active on the target.
Increases Malefic Rapture damage by 5% and reduces its cast time by 10%.
Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 4.0% for 8 sec.
Critical strikes from your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction have a chance to grant Nightfall.
Malefic Rapture deals an additional 108,512 Shadowflame damage to each target it affects.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by 20%. Nightfall increases the damage of Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul by an additional 50%.

Unleashing your demonic soul bestows a fiendish entity unto the soul of its targets, dealing 355,103 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Soul Anathema.
Your demonic soul deals 100% increased damage to targets affected by your Unstable Affliction.
Dark Pact now shields you for an additional 50% of the sacrificed health.

When you kill a target, its tortured soul is flung into a nearby enemy for 3 sec. This effect inflicts 50,502 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds every 0.8 sec.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Fel Domination cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Damage dealt by your demonic soul is increased by 10%.

Consuming Nightfall feeds the demonic entity within you, causing it to appear and deal 264,184 Shadow damage to your target.

Soul Anathema damage increased by 25% and is dealt 20% faster.

Consuming Nightfall activates Shared Fate or Feast of Souls.
Corruption deals damage 25% faster and Haunt grants Nightfall.
Your Soul Rot spell is empowered by the demonic entity within you, causing it to grant 3 Soul Shards that each contain a Succulent Soul.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

 Demonic Circle: Teleport

Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
